Name: Dance like a butterfly, Shot like a Bee!
About the game: The indie shooting game is born! This game is about exploring the steampunk stage by controlling a player which appearance is a bee or butterfly. ENJOI!!! ·User Guide Arrow keys ... operate the player, move Z key ... Shot, decision X key ... Special shot Shift key ... The player turns into a bee Basically the same as the touhOu project ・ Player characteristics BUTTERFLY can move fast and can shoot a wide range of shots Great for sparsely populated enemies or when the bullet density is uneven BEE is sluggish and can shoot shots focused on a small area Ideal when enemies are crowded or when you want to move finely and precisely
